divs: sighting detailssilver aluminum disc shape object in the sky, reflecting from the sun, moving extremely fast, noway it was a airplane, made no noise. very swift and accurate in movement... saw another same sighting back in 7\12\2000 clear blue sky , warm weather, sunny day, both times of sightings was in the day clear sky
